original_text: Shallum son of Jabesh conspired against Zechariah. He attacked him in front of the people, assassinated him and succeeded him as king.
korean_text: 야베스의 아들 살룸이 그를 반역하여 백성 앞에서 쳐죽이고 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: Shallum son of Jabesh conspired against Zechariah.
sentences.korean_translation: 야베스의 아들 살룸이 스가랴를 대적하여 모반하였다.

sentences.original_text: He attacked him in front of the people,
